page.title: 18Compilation of Material
page.content: My Mum has been given the Domesday Project to do by our acting Head- mistress. One night after school, Mum came to collect the computer because we did not have one of our own. With it we got the tape recorder and the screen. We took it home that week because it was half term and nobody was using it. On Sunday Mum realised that she had forgotten to ask for an Ordnance Survey map. I was allowed to help my Mum a bit but I was not allowed to interfere. Mum had to put the information in about our school like: telephone number, address and post code. After that she stopped because it kept saying stop the tape recorder when it was on. So we waited till my Dad came home and we told him. But he didn't know any more than I did so we switched it off and left it till Monday when everybody had a day off.
